attributes.action: We need TOILET facility for free to all train stations and important bus stops
attributes.background: Visitors, Local people who suffer from diabetics, Working People, Children, we need at least pee facility for free. Specially busy cities like London, Manchester, Cardiff, Edinburgh, Belfast do not have free toilet facility. Even pubs and food shops are not allowed if you are not customer.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

The decision on whether to charge for toilets is the responsibility of the company managing the station.
